title: Recycling coordinator
context: §342G-12.5 Recycling coordinator. There is established a position of assistant to the coordinator of the office of solid waste management to be known as the recycling coordinator. The position may be appointed by the director in accordance with chapter 76. [L 1995, c 229, §2; am L 2000, c 253, §150; am L 2005, c 226, §8; am L 2006, c 300, §9]
